Posts.Content: steph100 wrote: Hi, I was wondering if anyone could give me some input on my ultrasound results. I have a biopsy appointment scheduled for next week and the waiting really sucks. Did anyone have similar results as me? Do you think my lump is leaning more on the benign or malignant side? An input is greatly appreciated. Thank you! Here are what the results say: There is a lobulated hypoechoic solid mass. This mass does show internal vascular flow. The mass measures 2.4 x 1.2 x 1.9 cm. It does show some internal echogenic foci. There is dense shadowing. There is through transmission. Margins are slightly indistinct. BI-RAD category 4 suspicious abnormality.   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Ultrasound Results... steph100 steph100

Posts.Content: Sep 22, 2014 07:03PM steph100 wrote: Thank you for your warm reply.  :) I'm just wondering if anyone had a similar ultrasound result as I, and what their outcome was. Just feels good to chat about it all.
